alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Northern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Orange; Osceola; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 4:42PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Brevard, far southeastern Orange, east central Volusia and far northeastern Osceola Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 442 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Apollo Beach to near Titusville Airport to near Lone Cabbage Fish Camp. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Titusville, Rockledge, Cocoa, Cocoa Beach, and Cape Canaveral. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
